thread.title: RCN Business to Present Social Media Victories Seminar
thread.title_full: RCN Business to Present Social Media Victories Seminar - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: RCN Business to Present Social Media Victories Seminar
text:
Breakfast event presented in partnership with Bloomberg Television and multiple Boston-area chambers
Boston, MA (PRWEB) October 07, 2015
RCN Business will present Social Media Victories: Real Businesses, Real Campaigns, Real Results, on Friday, October 16, 2015, from 8:00 am to 10:00 am at the Newton Marriott Hotel. The seminar is being held in partnership with Bloomberg Television and local chambers, including the Newton-Needham Chamber, Brookline Chamber, Waltham Chamber, Watertown-Belmont Chamber and Wellesley Chamber.
As a leading authority on business trends, Patrick Schwerdtfeger will share valuable social media strategies that businesses of all sizes can implement immediately to build meaningful results. The seminar will cover the best-selling author’s essential ingredients to “getting your business" found on popular social media platforms and more advanced strategies to grow social media into a “business builder” with measurable results.
“RCN Business is committed to supporting small, medium and enterprise businesses in Boston and excited that we could help bring this very relevant seminar to the area,” comments Jeff Carlson Vice President and General Manager of RCN Boston. “In our technology-focused world, social media has become an incredibly important tool for reaching current and potential customers and we are confident that this seminar will arm attendees with the knowledge to take their social media strategies to the next level.”
Registration includes breakfast, a complimentary copy of Schwerdtfeger’s book, Marketing Shortcuts for the Self-Employed, Q & A, raffles and a book signing opportunity. The cost is $10 for chamber members and $20 for non-members. To register, visit http://bit.ly/1PqpuPg .
Schwerdtfeger is also the author of "Make Yourself Useful, Marketing in the 21st Century". He is a regular speaker for Bloomberg TV and has given keynotes and workshops about business trends, technology and innovative online marketing channels at conferences and business events around the world. At latest count, his podcasts have been downloaded over 50,000 times in 27 countries and his articles have been published on thousands of websites. Patrick has been featured by the New York Times, LA Times, San Francisco Chronicle, CNN Money, Fortune, Bloomberg Businessweek, the Associated Press, MONEY Magazine and Forbes, among others.
# # #
About RCN Business Services
RCN Business Service provides industry-leading high-speed Internet, voice, video and network solutions to businesses of all sizes. Delivered through a wholly-owned, state-of-the-art fiber-rich network and supported by 100% U.S.-based customer service, RCN Business serves businesses in Boston, Chicago, Philadelphia, Lehigh Valley (PA), Washington, D.C., and New York City. RCN Business received the Metro Ethernet Forum’s CE 2.0 certification in the E-Line, E-LAN and E-Access categories in 2014.

About Bloomberg Television
The BLOOMBERG TELEVISION® service is the only worldwide 24-hour business and financial television network. With 2,400 news professionals around the world, they cover the major stories when they happen, from where they happen.
